p: Ziziphora tenuior L. may possess an antidepressant-like effect, and its effect is similar to fluoxetine [ 269]. The composition of the ethanolic extract of Ziziphora tenuior contains two new flavonoids named as “ziziphorin A and ziziphorin B,” 1-hentetracontanol [ 270], ursolic acid [ 271], oleanolic acid (5) [ 272], β-sitosterol-3-O- β-glucoside [ 273], and apigenin [ 274].
